name: Zometry
description:
Zometry is a survival top down shooter that focus on the use of light and your surrounding to kill all the square zombies! The only way to move is through shoot with your mouse, and you only move away from the direction you shoot! Your goal here is to stay alive as long as possible! So don't be afraid to shoot in the dark! 


This game is made for Minimalist Game Jam.
NOTE that it will have more update until it's fairly playable.
